statements: SELECT * FROM trip_itinerary;
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trip_itinerary;
SELECT destination, start_date, end_date FROM trip_itinerary WHERE trip_id = 1;
SELECT destination, activities FROM trip_itinerary WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT destination, accommodation_details FROM trip_itinerary ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date FROM trip_itinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date, activities FROM trip_itinerary WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date, accommodation_details FROM trip_itinerary WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT trip_id, destination, start_date, end_date, transportation_details FROM trip_itinerary WHERE destination LIKE '%beach%';
SELECT * FROM trip_itinerary WHERE end_date < '2023-06-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_name = 'Hiking'
SELECT activity_id, activity_name FROM activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_type = 'Hotel' ORDER BY check_in_date
SELECT accommodation_name, accommodation_type, check_in_date FROM accommodations
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%hiking%';
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_location = 'New York' ORDER BY check_in_date DESC;
SELECT accommodation_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM accommodations WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY check_in_date;
SELECT activity_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM activities WHERE activity_name IN ('Camping', 'Sightseeing') ORDER BY activity_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM activities;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM activities ORDER BY duration_hours DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location, duration_hours FROM activities WHERE location = 'Beach';
SELECT * FROM accommodations WHERE type = 'Hotel' ORDER BY accommodation_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE departure_city = 'New York' AND arrival_city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM activities;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM activities WHERE duration_hours > 5;
SELECT accommodation_name, location FROM accommodations WHERE type = 'Hotel';
SELECT * FROM transportation WHERE departure_city = 'New York' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location FROM activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY activity_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_location FROM activities;
SELECT accommodation_name, accommodation_rating FROM accommodations;
SELECT * FROM transportation ORDER BY transportation_departure_time DESC;
SELECT trip_name, trip_start_date, activity_name FROM trips INNER JOIN activities ON trips.activity_id = activities.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_location FROM activities WHERE activity_duration > INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT trip_name, trip_start_date, trip_end_date FROM trips WHERE trip_start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trip_start_date DESC;
SELECT accommodation_name, accommodation_type, accommodation_rating FROM accommodations WHERE accommodation_rating >= 4.5;

SELECT trip_name, activity_name, transportation_type FROM trips JOIN activities ON trips.activity_id = activities.activity_id JOIN transportation ON trips.transportation_id = transportation.transportation_id;
SELECT * FROM activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT accommodation_name, location, capacity FROM accommodations ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT trip_name, start_date, end_date FROM trips WHERE total_cost < 1000;

SELECT trip_name, accommodation_name, departure_datetime FROM trips JOIN trip_details ON trips.trip_id = trip_details.trip_id JOIN transportation ON trip_details.transportation_id = transportation.transportation_id ORDER BY departure_datetime ASC;
SELECT * FROM activities WHERE activity_id = 1;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'Outdoor';
SELECT * FROM accommodations ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT transportation_id, vehicle_type, departure_datetime, arrival_datetime FROM transportation WHERE departure_datetime > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trip_name, start_date, end_date, total_cost FROM trips WHERE total_cost < 500.00;
